pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Reconstruction of Disease Outbreaks by Combining Epidemiologic and Genomic Data // Bayesian reconstruction of disease outbreaks using epidemiological and genetic information. Jombart T, Cori A, Didelot X, Cauchemez S, Fraser C and Ferguson N. 2014. doi:10.1371/journal.pcbi.1003457. Campbell, F, Cori A, Ferguson N, Jombart T. 2019. doi:10.1371/journal.pcbi.1006930.
